page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: WE , THE PUPILS AND STAFF OF TEALING PRIMARY SCHOOL , WISH TO THANK ALL THE TEALING RESIDENTS WHO WERE KIND ENOUGH TO COMPLETE QUESTIONAIRES.THANKS ARE ALSO DUE TO MR. PRYDE FOR A CONDUCTED TOUR OF, AND INFORMATION ABOUT ANGUS TRANSMISSION STATION ; TO REV. HELEN JOHNSTONE M.A.,B.D.;TO MISS A MILLAR; AND TO MR. N. STURROCK BMSc. THE PUPILS AND STAFF CONCERNED WERE:_ P.7:B McGREGOR;S STURROCK;J KANE;D BROWNLIE;K DAVIE;A MILLAR;M PIRIE P.6:C CONWAY;M McLEOD;J WADE;A BLACK;A M MILLAR P.5:P GIBB;A REID;N BLACK;J McBRIDE;L HAGGART TEACHING STAFF ARE MR. D.C. STURROCK AND MRS. E.E. KOHLER.
